content.rendered:
Directed by Christopher Nolan.

Written by Christopher Nolan. Kai Bird. Martin Sherwin.

Cast Cillian Murphy .Emily Blunt .Matt Damon.

Language English.

Producer Thomas Hayslip. Christopher Nolan. Charles Roven. Emma Thomas.

Production Universal Pictures. Atlas Entertainment. Syncopy.
